name: Street Shuffle
description:
Explore the streets of Dunkopolis, a center for street performers everywhere where the only way to resolve conflict is by using your performance skills to win over the crowd. Play as Ace, an up and coming street magician looking to test their skills and earn some cash along the way.

  • Face off against other performances using a unique card drafting mechanic
  • Build your deck as you level up Ace and all your friends
  • Visit several vibrant locations of Dunkopolis
  • Jam out to our original soundtrack that will have you moving your body along to the beat while your team pulls off their best moves
  • Features a colorful cast of characters that bring the city of Dunkopolis to life

You can't make it alone in Dunkopolis. Befriend other performers, earn some money, and perform your heart out! Though be careful, making a name for yourself might bring some unwanted attention and powerful enemies along with it.

Do you have what it takes to rise to the top?
